Reviews.Content: reading reviews expecting 1 clean functioning hotel location 2 breakfast 3 friendly management 1 3 aint bad guess doesnt hotel orleans wasnt hotel stars experience overall wasnt return chose stars owners workers top notch cant location blocks canal blocks bourbon street didnt feel unsafe anyway outside building hideously ugly doesnt bother inside lobby nice special upgraded corner suite living coffee bedroom bathroom views window fine location heating fine normally orleans surely time 30s night fall apart window piece duck tape holding crack single pane window allowed constant draft fortunately heater fine combat draft bed fine remote control didnt tvs didnt bother wasnt anyway partying late weekend mardi gras weekend saints superbowl slept shower 11 am absolutely hot water left shower hot lukewarm water shower fast night didnt stay late couldnt sleep saints won superbowl people hollering 7am morning didnt bother celebrate burned nights morning woke 9am mainly try breakfast shower nice hot maybe beat people hot water day onto breakfast buffet based comments expecting grand ole spread sorely disappointed fruits except bananas apples coffee juice nurse hangover eggs grits didnt appear look fresh cereal instead canal ihop close eating breakfast buffet

HotelInfo.Name: Quality Inn & Suites Downtown
HotelInfo.Address: 210 O'Keefe Avenue, New Orleans, LA 70112
